mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count ,ROWNUM rno FROM ie_mainlist) WHERE rno BETWEEN 1 and 5 order by rno
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count ,ROWNUM rno FROM ie_mainlist order by ml_count desc) WHERE rno between ${rno} AND ${rno}+4 order by rno

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rno, ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count, ml_tag FROM( SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count, ml_tag FROM ie_mainlist WHERE ml_tag like '%${ml_tag}%' order by ml_count desc ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN ${rno} and ${rno}+4
